sentence.text: Knowledge of Pharmacists about Anti-epileptic Drugs in a Developing Country.
Pharmacists play an essential role in educating the epileptic patients about their disease and their medications
Improving the patient's awareness may lead to improve their compliance and decrease drug-drug interaction and ultimately improve their quality of life
This study aimed to assess the pharmacist's knowledge about anti-epileptic drugs in Khartoum State, Sudan
We conducted a descriptive cross-sectional study in Khartoum State, Sudan

Proportionate stratified sampling was used to determine the targeted Pharmacies, and all pharmacists who were present in the selected pharmacy at the time of data collection and fulfilled our selection criteria were included in the study
